code: var reducer=function reducer(){var state=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:[{boardName:"Food",boardColor:"#FFAEC0",id:1},{boardName:"Nature",boardColor:"#C5C5FC",id:2},{boardName:"Sports",boardColor:"#A7F0F9",id:3}];var action=arguments.length>1?arguments[1]:undefined;if(action.type==='add'){return state.concat(action.payload);}else{return state;}};export default reducer;
